briefTitle: ICG vs Blue Patent as a Tracer in the Performance of TAD in Patients With cN1 Breast Carcinoma After Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
officialTitle: ICG vs Blue Patent as a Tracer in the Performance of TAD in Patients With cN1 Breast Carcinoma After Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Detection rate of sentinel lymph node
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer cN+ patients who undergo neadjuvant treatment.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients in whom there is a contraindication for the use of ICG.
* Patients in whom there is evidence of progression of the disease after neoadjuvant treatment.
